global.emptyFeedSubtitle: You can follow more users to build up your timeline

zap.invoiceFooter:
You must use Bitcoin wallet which support Lightning
such as: Blue Wallet, Bitkit, Phoenix,...

user.logoutConfirmSubtitle: You can always log back in at any time. If you just want to switch accounts, you can do that by adding an existing account.

editor.title: New Post
editor.successMessage: Your note has been published successfully.

search.empty: Try searching for people, notes, or keywords

welcome.title:
Lume is a magnificent client for Nostr to meet, explore
and freely share your thoughts with everyone.
welcome.footer: Before joining Nostr, you can take time to learn more about Nostr

loginWithPrivkey.title: Enter your Private Key
loginWithPrivkey.subtitle:
Lume will put your private key to <1>{{service}}</1>.
It will be secured by your OS.

signup.title: Let's Get Started
signup.subtitle: Choose one of methods below to create your account
signup.selfManageMethodDescription: You create your keys and keep them safe.
signup.providerMethodDescription: A 3rd party provider will handle your sign in keys for you.

signupWithSelfManage.title: This is your new Account Key
signupWithSelfManage.subtitle: Keep your key in safe place. If you lose this key, you will lose access to your account.
signupWithSelfManage.confirm1: I understand the risk of lost private key.
signupWithSelfManage.confirm2: I will make sure keep it safe and not sharing with anyone.
signupWithSelfManage.confirm3: I understand I cannot recover private key.

signupWithProvider.title: Let's set up your account on Nostr
signupWithProvider.usernameFooter: Use to login to Lume and other Nostr apps. You can choose provider you trust to manage your account
signupWithProvider.emailFooter: Use for recover your account if you lose your password

onboardingSettings.title: You're almost ready to use Lume.
onboardingSettings.subtitle: Let's start personalizing your experience.

notification.title: Push notification
notification.subtitle: Enabling push notifications will allow you to receive notifications from Lume.

lowPower.title: Low Power Mode
lowPower.subtitle: Limited relay connection and hide all media, sustainable for low network environment.

translation.title: Translation (nostr.wine)
translation.subtitle: Translate text to your preferred language, powered by Nostr Wine.

onboardingSettings.footer: There are many more settings you can configure from the 'Settings' Screen. Be sure to visit it later.

interests.subtitle: Pick things you'd like to see in your home feed.
